name: The Spooky Game
description:
3D horror game that is not really 3D and not that scary.

Definitely could use improvements, I'm at 45-ish hours, I'll see what I can do, but it's playable.

Move with WASD, set camera zoom with scrollwheel. Collect the torches and avoid the monsters. The monsters despawn if you run far enough. There is no real end, both torches and monsters spawn every minute.

UPDATE: monsters now spawn a bit further away from you, also added (a very simple) online leaderboard
